root.name: Midkemia Online
root.description: OverviewThe game itself is set after A Darkness at Sethanon, the third and final book in the Riftwar Saga. A new prince of the Dark Brotherhood commands the forces of the Moredhel to march on the kingdom, hell-bent on finding an ancient artefact with the power to destroy the world.Players may choose sides in the epic war of good vs evil, and meet many familiar characters from the book series along the way.
